bibl.title: Fragments from a Catabasis Ritual in a Greek Magical Papyri.
bibl.note: P. Mich. III, 154 contains some formulae from a ritual of catabasis which have found their way into a magical spell. The discussion is concerned primarily with the interpretation of the spell in terms of the history of religions, not with papyrological or philological problems.
Betz Hans Dieter, Fragments from a Catabasis Ritual in a Greek Magical Papyri.
